full_summary:
# Running Track Project
## Project Announcement

The Canadian federal government invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the Running Track Project in Regina, Saskatchewan. The project involves the construction of a new running track with a width of 2100mm, comprising of 1 – 150mm lifts of A base compacted and a single 75 mm lift of compacted crushed fines aggregate sprayed with calcium chloride on a geotextile with compacted subgrade. Approximately 2,400M of new running track will be constructed with the remainder being on existing roads. 

## Specifications

* Material specifications include compacted crushed fines aggregate, calcium chloride, and galvanized steel
* Geotextile and compacted subgrade required
* Line painting and mile marker installation will be part of the project
* Six (6) outdoor fitness equipment will be built along the running track
* Obstacles will be constructed of galvanized steel, screw piles, and pressure-treated lumber

**Project Timeline**

* The project must be completed by June 30th, 2023
* This is the first phase of a two-phase competition; bidders will be pre-qualified in Phase 1 based on mandatory requirements, and Phase 2 will invite pre-qualified bidders to submit financial bids on the project
* The list of pre-qualified bidders will be valid for 60 days after meeting the mandatory requirements or award of contract in Phase 2

**Tender Details**

* Solicitation number: M5000-23-4129/A
* Amendment number: 1
* Publication date: March 10, 2023
* Tender closing date: March 28, 2023, at 16:00:00
* Tender status: Closed
* Regions of opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of delivery: Saskatchewan

**Contact Information**

* Sandra Robinson 
* sandra.robinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca 
* Phone: 780-670-8626

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Procurement category: CNST
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of delivery: Saskatchewan
* Indigenous procurement: Refer to the attached documents for more information

**Security Clearance**

A security clearance is required for this project. Refer to the attached documents for more information.
